column2: ALPHA BLACK TO PAPA BEAR. WE ARE ON THE BASE IN FEW MOMENTS. OVER.
ALPHA BLACK TO PAPA BEAR. I THINK THATS THE LAST OF THEM. I THINK WE DEFEATED THEM. OVER.
BRAVO LEADER TO ANYBODY CLOSE BY. WE ARE GETTING OUR ASSES KICKED. I AM THE ONLY ONE ALIVE. BRAVO OUT!
THIS IS CHARLIE BLACK ONE. OUR TANKS HAVE BEEN BLOWN AWAY. I AM OUTTA HERE!
ALPHA THIS IS DELTA. GET READY FOR PICK UP. OVER.
GOOD LUCK ALPHA BLACK. DELTA OUT.
PAPA BEAR TO ALL FORCES. RUSSIAN ATTACK HAS BEEN DEFEATED. GREAT JOB! OVER.
Emergency! get to the base defense!
